document_data.name: Haeleeya Hanadroum
document_data.mainbody: '''Haeleeya Hanadroum'''  was a shopkeeper in [[Red Larch]] and an [[Emerald Enclave]] supporter during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis of [[1491 DR]].
document_data.Relationship: Since they saved her life, Haeleeya always supported the Enclave, and she shared with them whatever interesting secret talk she heard in the bathhouse.
document_data.Activities: Haeleeya managed the village bathhouse in Red Larch.
document_data.History: In her youth, Haeleeya became lost in the wilderness but was saved by an Emerald Enclave [[ranger]]. She later moved from [[Amn]] to Red Larch.
